bibl.title: Report: Effect of Dr. Hanson's Serum on Leptospira icteroides and Leptospira icterohaemorrhagiae, [s.n.], June 20, 1923

div1.p: This report focuses on the results of experiments conducted by Russell, Nichols, Hanson, Muller, Dieterich, Iglesias, and Noguchi.

div1.head: Report: Effect of Dr. Hanson's Serum on Leptospira icteroides and Leptospira icterohaemorrhagiae, [s.n.], June 20, 1923
div1.p:
June 19, 1923 EFFECT OF THE SERUMS OF DR. HANSON (who had yellow fever 4 yrs. ago)
AND OF DR. IGLESIAS (vaccinated 3 yrs. ago) UPON LEPTOSPIRA ICTEROIDES
Tests carried out by Drs. Hanson, Muller, Dieterich, and Iglesias

row.cell:

culture, 0.5 cc.

Serum (Iglesias), 0.5 cc.
